Public Interface IOrderedEnumerable(Of TElement) Implements IEnumerable(Of TElement)
generic <typename TElement> public interface class IOrderedEnumerable : System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<TElement>

span.span: The type of the elements of the sequence.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类型是可枚举的因为它继承自。This type is enumerable because it inherits from . 扩展方法和类型的对象上运行。The extension methods and operate on objects of type . 类型的对象可以通过调用主要排序方法之一获取或，将返回。An object of type can be obtained by calling one of the primary sort methods, or , which return an . 和，从属排序方法，也会返回类型的对象。 and , the subordinate sort methods, in turn also return an object of type . 此设计允许任何数量的连续调用或，其中每个调用将执行对已排序的数据从前面的调用返回执行从属排序。This design allows for any number of consecutive calls to or , where each call performs a subordinate ordering on the sorted data returned from the previous call. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何执行主要和辅助对执行排序的字符串数组。The following example demonstrates how to perform a primary and secondary ordering on an array of strings. 它还演示生成是可枚举。It also demonstrates that the resulting is enumerable. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法提供的功能类似的由或，具体取决于`descending`是`true`或`false`。The functionality provided by this method is like that provided by or , depending on whether `descending` is `true` or `false`. 它们都执行类型的已排序的序列的从属排序。They both perform a subordinate ordering of an already sorted sequence of type . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用上执行次要排序。The following code example demonstrates how to use to perform a secondary ordering on an .
